com.redhat.rhn.frontend.integration

Class IntegrationService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.redhat.rhn.frontend.integration.IntegrationService

  • public class IntegrationService
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for managing integration from Spacewalk to other external systems. Examples include logic for interacting between Spacewalk and Cobbler.
